description: Try our easy to follow Hoisin Pork Rashers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hoisin Pork Rashers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cm piece piece ginger, finely grated
2 bunch chinese broccoli, cut into lengths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine marinade ingredients in a small bowl. Arrange pork rashers in a shallow dish. Pour over marinade and refrigerate for 2 hours.

Preheat oven to 210Â°C. Place a wire rack into a baking dish. Remove pork from marinade and lay in a single layer onto the wire rack. Reserve marinade. Place into baking dish and fill with water to 2 cm deep.
Roast pork for 40 minutes, turning and basting every 10 mins. Serve with steamed rice and Chinese broccoli.
